title: ‘House of the Dragon’ Hair Inspires an Icy Blond Renaissance
description: The icy-white hair from “House of the Dragon” has some fans reaching for the bleach. But it’s not for the faint of heart.
dc:creator: Anna Grace Lee
media:description: Princess Rhaenyra Targaryen (Emma D’Arcy) and Prince Daemon Targaryen (Matt Smith) from “House of the Dragon”
